Next up, you'll want to get your hands on some compromising info. Now, I'm not saying go out there and hack into their system or anything (although, if you're feeling extra sneaky...). Just use some good old-fashioned digging skills to find something juicy. Maybe they've got a skeleton in the closet or two.

Once you've got that dirt, start spreading it around like wildfire. Get your friends on board, get them to share it with their friends, and before you know it, the whole internet will be talking about how great you are at ruining reputations.

Just remember, this is all just for fun (or so I keep telling myself). Don't go getting too carried away or anything...
